reviews.review: Best time ever to try this game with the addition of crossplay and before they reinstate MMR.
really gets your adrenaline going. have only been playing for a few weeks and have really gotten addicted to it.

This game isn't easy at all for new players, but if you push through the first 50 hours it'll be the most fun game you've ever played

This game has some issues including somewhat regular occurence of bugs and errors, issues with matchmaking or balance issues, but it's overall a pretty entertaining experience to play it.

Good game, can be toxic. Ranks don't mean anything in this game because i find the same skill in 20 and 10. If you know the maps it can be very useful, and you also need to know how to loop and other stuff. Games can take long to find. Camping killers can be very annoying. Servers arent always the best, same with hitboxes
Game:7/10
The Game Is Totally Fun To Play <3

It's a great game, a lot of heart and well supported. My most liked feature is a hard focus on play balance. Every perk has it's own pros and cons. Nothing really feels overpowering. There are some glitches and bugs that make it in each patch but they're not left in, and it's still a fun game.
Muito divertido entre amigos, e sempre esta atualizando com novidades!
getting better and better,  one of the best horror games around.

this game's trush af, after dogsh1t resident evil chapter, pc's performance is as bad as console's. contant screen freezing, teleporting, fps drops. srsly it would be better if they didnt release or fix anything, cuz it turns out worse most of the time. 0/10

If you have gaming friends who loves horror survival then that's cherry on top(ofcourse they have to spend money on this game to play with you).Don't play this game if you are scary cat.This is a teamwork game if you are playing as survivor.One of the best horror survival game so far.Just go for it!!!
waaaay more then just the Cat and Mouse Game i thought it would be... so much more!!!

What was once a great horror game turned into a milking game where only the mainstream matters. If you used to be a fan of this game, don't try it, it doesn't care about its old fans, its only about mainstream now. It shouldn't even have the horror tag on it, with the recent update, it removed all of the atmosphere that it had, the lighting is butchered, the animation looks stiff, there's no more dread or any kind of eerie moment. Everything horror is gone.

Not to mention the never ending game breaking bugs and greedy 10 dollar cosmetics. NOT. WORTH. IT.
Ğ•ÑĞ»Ğ¸ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ½ÑƒĞ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ€ÑƒĞºĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ¼Ñƒ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚ ÑƒĞ´Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ´Ğ±Ğ´ Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ ÑĞ´ĞµĞ»Ğ°Ñ

Very poor connection today, I've been disconnected from the game 3 times in a row. What's the most annoying thing is it counted me as I lose and add-ons I used in that game are gone for nothing.

Once again, I've also experienced cliff bug when I was playing as survivor. This game is not that good espicially today.
Gosto muito, tirando uns bugs estranho

in all honesty i fucking hate this game its matchmaking has gone to shit, they constantly feel the need to break balancing with either "fixes" or just having killers be WAY too strong when they first add them (probably to boost sales). I've played this game on playstation since it came out. I have over one thousand hours for sure and i've hated probably seven hundred of them, whether it's because i was waiting to join a game for ten percent of my over all play or that another sixty percent has been soiled by shit tier killers who know nothing but camp and tunnel (therefore forcing me to play as toxic as them and ruin that game for both of us). More than gameplay issues though this game is so broken, the amount of times ive just floated into the air or got stuck in objects on this game rivals even ark.

Overall this game is fun and i probably will waste another few hundred hours with my friends, doesnt mean im not going to get pissed off though when a huntress throws an axe into a wall and it injures me.
